name: eCom Design Summit Online
content: Get ready to react to the fast world of retail, where it's not just the styles that move quickly. We meet the experts who will share the inside track on the latest methods for optimising your eCommerce product. We're continuing the conversation, picking up where we left off in London and taking things global. Join us from your screen of choice as we introduce you to some of the biggest brands in the world whose speakers will teach you ground-breaking practical ideas to transform your projects. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1510235-0?pid=4868 Time: 14:00 - 21:00 Price: General Admission: GBP 105.00
